Text Tabs.Name: <size=13>Home</size>
Text Lines: <size=35>[US] <color=#4A95CC>Exile Island Survival Server </color>[Perks+]</size>
<size=15>Heavily Modded<color=#83b8c7> PvE Server</color> with <color=#83b8c7>Dynamic PvP </color>Zones</size>
<size=15><color=#4A95CC>Active and Engaged Admins and Moderators</color> that care about the players and their experience.</size>
<size=15><color=#83b8c7>Creative Building</color> is encouraged with <color=#83b8c7>Multiplied Gather Rates</color></size>
<size=15>Access to <color=#83b8c7>Private and Virtual</color> Pumpjacks and Quarries, as well as base Recyclers!</size>
<size=15>Many exciting features are planned for future addition! <color=#83b8c7>Join our team!</color></size>
Discord: Come join us @ discord.ExileIsland.netor use invite code: JuyguE2U6R
<size=15><color=#83b8c7>Webstore:</color> You can support the server by going online to <color=#4a95cc>https://shop.ExileIsland.net</color></size>

<size=15>Server is owned and operated in the US. Blueprints are wiped each month (for default players) Map wipe takes place every <color=#83b8c7> First Thursday</color> of the month - the same time as force wipe. We have a two day purge before Wipe happens. If you have suggestions or ideas, please don't hesitate to post your thoughts on the Discord 'Suggestions' forum!</size>

<size=15><color=#83b8c7>
VIP Packages: </color> You can purchase items and packages from our webstore at Shop.ExileIsland.Net - Subscription packages are available now in four different tiers. A one-time payment for a 'Lifetime' package, then three monthly VIP groups. You can be The Reject, The Outcast, or The Exile - in order of prestige. Any and all contributions go a long way towards helping the server grow! If you enjoy yourself here and you would like to donate or contribute in some other way - Reach out to Clay or an Admin on discord and let us know what you have to offer! This is not a simple project that one man can run on his own! <color=83b8c7>It takes an Island!</color></size>

Text Tabs.Name: <size=13>Rules</size>
Text Lines: <size=15><color=#4A95CC>Exile Island Code of Conduct:</color></size>

<size=16>This is a Southern US-based, English language server. We welcome players from all over the world! If you prefer to speak in another language, please use Discord or another service to do so. Due to us being ignorant, mono-lingual Americans, we cannot moderate any languages other than English. We apologize for any inconvenience and hope you understand!</size>

○ Game Play: This is a PvE server with designated PvP zones. Attempting to raid a player-owned base or engaging in PvP outside of these areas is strictly prohibited. On this flipside, if you are attacked in a PvP zone - there is nothing the Admin or Moderators can do to get your stuff back for you if it is taken. Killing and looting is permitted in these areas.
○ Stealing: Again, this is a PvE server. Stealing from another player (outside of PvP areas) in any way is strictly prohibited.

○ Leeching: Do not join the server and immediately start asking in the chat for people to give you handouts. This is not the same thing as asking for help. 'If you give a man a fish, you feed him for a day. If you teach a man to fish, you feed him for a lifetime.'
○ Cheating: Any hack or cheat programs that are detected will result in an instant and permanent ban. We play fair on Exile Island.
○ Glitching: Abusing any kind of exploit, whether game or server related, will also be considered cheating. Again, this will result in a permanent ban.

○ Maturity: This is an Mature (18+) game so we expect you to act that way. If you're going to behave like a child - ie: throwing temper tantrums, petulance in the voice chat, or just generally behaving obnoxiously - You will be removed.
○ Association: Teaming or playing with cheaters / glitchers will make you guilty by association. Choose your teammates carefully!

○ Toxicity / Trolling: Racism, hate-speech, hate-symbols, cyber-bullying, and encouraging self-harm are not tolerated. The same goes for trolling other players in anyway. Do not build to block other players in. Do not lock other players in your base. You will receive a 3-day ban on first offence.
○ Alt Accounts: We are not EA, Rockstar, or Blizzard. Banned players returning on an alt-account will receive an additional permanent ban.

○ Spam & Ads: Spamming the chat unnecessarily will not be tolerated. Advertising of any kind, including but not limited to: other servers, gambling sites, your pyramid scheme, or your girlfriend's Mary Kay stuff... will result in you being kicked.
○ Sketchiness: Any other odd behavior that could cause issues. Such trying to impersonate admins or other players (or clans)

Text Tabs.Name: <size=13>Wipe Cycle</size>
Text Lines: Text Style

Text in Rust plugins can be styled with standard rich text tags, it's similar to HTML. Every tag must be closed at the end of text line, otherwise none of the tags will work and they will be shown as regular text. If you ever encounter this issue, please do not reach out to support for help and double check your text lines instead.
Available Tags
Available Fonts <size=9>(fonts are applied to whole page)</size>
robotocondensed-bold.ttf
robotocondensed-regular.ttf
permanentmarker.ttf
droidsansmono.ttf

Text Tabs.Name: <size=13>Links</size>
Text Lines: How to enable addons
Each tab has addon option right under text line. Simply put addon name in there.
You can find list of addon names in plugin description.

addon is assigned to this tab.
